thread.title: A magnificent Tuesday morning sunrise in Washington
thread.title_full: A magnificent Tuesday morning sunrise in Washington

author: Jason Samenow
title: A magnificent Tuesday morning sunrise in Washington
text:
A magnificent Tuesday morning sunrise in Washington The inside track on Washington politics. Be the first to know about new stories from PowerPost. Sign up to follow, and we’ll e-mail you free updates as they’re published. You’ll receive free e-mail news updates each time a new story is published. You’re all set! By Jason Samenow By Jason Samenow February 21 at 10:38 AM Follow @capitalweather Sunrise at the Jefferson Memorial, Feb. 21, 2017. (Kevin Ambrose) 
We lost the May-like warmth, but gained a spectacular sunrise. 
Ocean air snuck into the Washington region Monday night and the marine flow, which cooled the air, pushed ashore a deck of clouds that were met by the rising sun Tuesday morning. Color exploded and the sky glowed yellow, orange, and red hues. 
Thanks to our readers on social media who shared beautiful photos from around the region… Sunrise at the Capitol, Feb. 21, 2017. (Kevin Ambrose) Spectacular sunrise over @uscapitol in D.C. this morning. [Photo taken at 06:43] #igdc #WashingtonDC pic.twitter.com/Dpa7Sxo2hm
